anytime: You can't just shoot a hole into the surface of Mars.
The only thing they fear... is you.
You were never one of us. You were nothing but a usurper...a false idol. My eyes have been opened. Let me help you to see, Slayer.
They are rage, brutal, without mercy. But you. You will be worse. Rip and tear, until it is done.
Warning: the Slayer has entered the facility.
Tell me... have you nothing to say to your creator... before you strike him down?
The mark of the Doom Slayer was burned upon his crypt, a warning to all of Hell that the terror within must never be freed.
May your thirst for retribution never quench, may the blood on your sword never dry, and may we never need you again.
